snippet.title: New Super Mario Bros. DS (Co-Op) - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Like my work? Support me!: https://ko-fi.com/shadey
Download (v1.01): https://nsmbhd.net/file/b3k003gKTDxrzK5B/New%20Super%20Mario%20Bros%20DS%20CO-OP%20(v1.01).zip
Huge thanks to TheGameratorT for helping me finish this project! Check out his channel here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRs--S94Z_zNS2eIJUHWjvA
NSMBHD Post: https://nsmbhd.net/thread/4317-new-super-mario-bros-ds-co-op/ (How to setup and play can also be found here)
Music (credit to SiIvaGunner): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qnenF2PrPk8&

This hack allows New Super Mario Bros. DS to be fully played with another player!

FAQ:
Q: How do I set this up?
A:
1). Download the patch here (v1.01): https://nsmbhd.net/file/b3k003gKTDxrzK5B/New%20Super%20Mario%20Bros%20DS%20CO-OP%20(v1.01).zip
2). Apply the patch to a clean US ROM of New Super Mario Bros .DS.
3). Launch the game on 2 DS's (or 2 MelonDS emulators) and both select the same save file.
4). Connect with the other player.
5). Play!

Q: Does this work on Flashcart/Android/TWiLight/MelonDS etc.?
A: Any software/program that can load a .nds file is capable of loading the game but the system/emulator needs to be able to connect to another player.
This means the game can only be played on a real DS (through a Flashcart, TWiLightMenu etc.) or on an emulator that is capable of emulating wireless (MelonDS is the only DS emulator capable of this).

Q: Does this work on a US copy of NSMBDS?
A: This only works on a US copy.

Q: How do I get to World 4/7?
A: Beat the boss on World 2/5 while both players are mini.
